description: '''Randy Rogers Band''' is an American [[country music]] band from [[San Marcos, Texas]]. The band is composed of Randy Rogers (lead vocals), Geoffrey Hill (guitar), Jon Richardson (bass guitar), Brady Black (fiddle), Les Lawless (drums), and Todd Stewart (guitar, fiddle, mandolin, keyboards). They have recorded seven studio albums and two live albums, and have charted seven singles on the ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]'' [[Hot Country Songs]] charts.
